feed.title: Keyvi Blog
feed.subtitle: Various bits and pieces of information about keyvi - the key value store optimized for size and lookup speed - internals, use cases, thougths.

entry.title: Welcome
entry.summary: Welcome to the keyvi blog site. On this page you will find news and noteworthy information about keyvi, internals, use cases etc. Contributions are welcome. This blog is based on Jekyll, posts can be created using this guide. For publishing, open a PR.
